pages.text: $(li)Squids are passive aquatic creatures that spawns in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/river)Rivers$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)These creatures are the favourite prey of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Cachalot Whales$(/l).$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ink_sac)Inc Sacs$(/l) on death.
